choiceText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "EDE6EF2B48FF262CDB39B795F391CDCC", "I\'m sorry about your husband, but don\'t lose hope. There\'s always a way forward, even in the darkest times. Speaking of which, have you heard any rumors about undead around here?")
name: DD_RVR_Lionhold_Villager02_9_Choice_1
